files.patch:
@@ -47,22 +47,15 @@
-    private static final String JAVA_MAIN_CONTENT;
-
-    static {
-        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
-        sb.append("public class Foo {\n")
-          .append("    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {\n")
-          .append("        if (args.length != 0) {\n")
-          .append("            System.out.println(\"unexpected args: \" + java.util.Arrays.toString(args));\n")
-          .append("            System.exit(1);\n")
-          .append("        }\n")
-          .append("        System.out.println(\"Running application on Java version: \"\n")
-          .append("                    + System.getProperty(\"java.version\"));\n")
-          .append("        System.out.println(\"Application launched with java.protocol.handler.pkgs=\"\n")
-          .append("                    + System.getProperty(\"java.protocol.handler.pkgs\"));\n")
-          .append("        System.out.println(\"Application launched with classpath: \"\n")
-          .append("                    + System.getProperty(\"java.class.path\"));\n")
-          .append("        System.out.println(\"Hello World\");\n")
-          .append("    }\n")
-          .append("}\n");
-
-        JAVA_MAIN_CONTENT = sb.toString();
-}
+    private static final String JAVA_MAIN_CONTENT = "public class Foo {\n" +
+            "public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {\n" +
+            "if (args.length != 0) {\n" +
+            "System.out.println(\"unexpected args: \" + java.util.Arrays.toString(args));\n" +
+            "System.exit(1);\n" +
+            "}\n" +
+            "System.out.println(\"Running application on Java version: \"\n" +
+            "System.getProperty(\"java.version\"));\n" +
+            "System.out.println(\"Application launched with java.protocol.handler.pkgs=\"\n" +
+            "System.getProperty(\"java.protocol.handler.pkgs\"));\n" +
+            "System.out.println(\"Application launched with classpath: \"\n" +
+            "System.getProperty(\"java.class.path\"));\n" +
+            "System.out.println(\"Hello World\");\n" +
+            "}\n" +
+            "}\n";
